entry.value: Shows how to work with a pandas.DataFrame using the new scripting API.

import knime.scripting.io as knio%%00010%%00010# Convert the first input table of the node into a pandas.DataFrame (use knio.input_tables[1] to convert the second one,%%00010# etc.).%%00010input_table = knio.input_tables[0].to_pandas()%%00010%%00010# TODO: work with the pandas.DataFrame here...%%00010output_table = input_table%%00010%%00010# Populate the first output table of the node (use knio.output_tables[1] to populate the second one, etc.).%%00010knio.output_tables[0] = knio.Table.from_pandas(output_table)%%00010
